Validation options
Validate the selected users.
Reject the selected users. This will delete their accounts.
Process the selected users
Here you can manage the emails that will be sent to the registered users, when they are validated or rejected.
Validation email:
This email will be sent when you validate an user, allowing him to participate to the contest.
Rejection email:
This email will be sent when you reject an user. Such an action will close it's account, and the user won't be allowed to participate to the contest.
Markers:
You can use special markers on the email messages, that will be substituted with the user informations.
The first name of the user.
The last name of the user.
Please click on the links below to edit the different emails:
